name: procps-ticker
description: Ticks `proc` info of the host machine at given intervals and exposes it via a stream interface.

scripts.test-0.8: npm remove procps && nave use 0.8 npm install procps && nave use 0.8 npm run test
scripts.test-0.10: npm remove procps && nave use 0.10 npm install procps && nave use 0.10 npm run test
scripts.test-all: npm run test-main && npm run test-0.8 && npm run test-0.10
